com.redhat.rhn.manager.monitoring
Class ModifyProbeCommand

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.manager.monitoring.ModifyProbeCommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreateServerProbeCommand, CreateTemplateProbeCommand
public class ModifyProbeCommand
extends java.lang.Object

A command to create or edit a probe. Use the setters to modify the probe. After all modifications are made, call storeProbe() to save the probe.

Constructor Detail

ModifyProbeCommand

public ModifyProbeCommand(User userIn,
                          Probe probe0)
Create a command that modifies an existing probe. The probe with the given probeid is loaded from the database.

Parameters:
userIn - the user editing the probe
probe0 - the probe to modify

ModifyProbeCommand

protected ModifyProbeCommand(User userIn,
                             Command command,
                             Probe probe0)
Create a command that modifies a new probe. The probe is created for command.

Parameters:
userIn - the user creating the probe
command - the command underlying the probe
probe0 - the empty, freshly created probe
